I ordered the Men's Penny Slip-on Loafer Diamond-Patterned Velvet Dress Shoes for some semi casual/dressy parties that lend themselves to some "fun" dress, theses definitely fit the bill.  The 11 was a perfect fit for me and they were not too snug. I would say that if you have wide feet they may not fit well as they do taper toward the toes. They are light, flexible and the rubber soles are comfortable.  Overall I am very please with thes shoes and would buy them again.
